data.eml:eml: Taxonomic review of freshwater Gammarus (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zamanpoore, Mehrdad, Grabowski, Michal, Poeckl, Manfred, Schiemer, Friedrich (2011): Taxonomic review of freshwater Gammarus (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from Iran. Zootaxa 3140: 1-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205631
